mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, task_type, start_time, end_time, grid_user_id, pre_duration, task_code, task_status, machine_uuid, assigner, assign_time, machine_lat, machine_lon, machine_desc, geo_hash, task_start_pic, task_end_pic
mapper.select: SELECT distinct g.id, g.gmt_create, g.start_time, g.assign_time, g.end_time, g.task_status, g.task_type, m.id mId, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(g.end_time) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(g.start_time) AS times, m.machine_name, c.company_name, c.id cId, b.id bId, b.company_name bCompany_name, m.street mAddr, m.province, m.city, m.area, u.user_name, g.task_details, g.task_start_pic, g.task_end_pic, g.assigner FROM grid_tasks g, base_machine_info m, grid_user_info u, grid_company c, base_company b WHERE g.machine_uuid = m.machine_uuid AND g.grid_user_id = u.id AND u.company_id = c.id AND b.id = c.company_id and g.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into grid_tasks (id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, task_type, start_time, end_time, grid_user_id, pre_duration, task_code, task_status, machine_uuid, assigner, assign_time, machine_lat, machine_lon, machine_desc, geo_hash, task_start_pic, task_end_pic, task_details) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gridUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{preDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{machineUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assigner,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{assignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{machineLat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{machineLon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{machineDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{geoHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskStartPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskEndPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskDetails,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update grid_tasks
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
grid_user_id = #{gridUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pre_duration = #{preDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_code = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_status = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
machine_uuid = #{machineUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assigner = #{assigner,jdbcType=BIGINT},
assign_time = #{assignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
machine_lat = #{machineLat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
machine_lon = #{machineLon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
machine_desc = #{machineDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
geo_hash = #{geoHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_start_pic = #{taskStartPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_end_pic = #{taskEndPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_details = #{taskDetails,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update grid_tasks set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, grid_user_id = #{gridUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pre_duration = #{preDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_code = #{taskCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_status = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, machine_uuid = #{machineUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assigner = #{assigner,jdbcType=BIGINT}, assign_time = #{assignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, machine_lat = #{machineLat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, machine_lon = #{machineLon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, machine_desc = #{machineDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, geo_hash = #{geoHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_start_pic = #{taskStartPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_end_pic = #{taskEndPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_details = #{taskDetails,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
